game.name: Word Chef Cookies
game.description:
Do you want to test or improve your vocabulary in a kitchen-inspired environment? If yes, trying Word Chef Cookies can be a right idea for you. Your objective in this brand new arcade game is to connect all the cookies you see on the plate to find out all the hidden and meaningful words. There are plenty of letters to find out by using your brain power. Draw a line through and help the right letters to connect with each other to create an appropriate word!

This cool html5 puzzle challenge includes multiple levels that are brain-storming challenges. Be fast and swipe to connect alphabets on the white plates! No worries if you make the wrong decision since there are no time limits and move limits. It will be amazing to learn lots of new English words and improve your vocabulary. When you click the play button, you would see some alphabets on a white plate. Try to eliminate the candy as fast as you can to get some extra scores in this cool connect-2 game!

This brain teaser matching game includes multiple colorful explosions, two game modes: Arcade and Time Counting (Classic), 7 new color boom effects, color-changing candy, easy-to-play gameplay, as well as outstanding graphics and music. You can try out this words puzzle challenge in tablets, desktops, and mobile phones. Create highest score in all the levels and share it with your friends! Good luck to have a blast in our more exciting kids puzzles without download!
